name: petrol, low-sulfur, import from Europe | petrol, low-sulfur | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/6772/documentation

This dataset represents the import of a refined petroleum product (petrol, low-sulfur) from Europe (without Switzerland) into Switzerland. Due to regulatory requirements, the quality of petrol imported is assumed to generally have a low sulfur content.

This activity starts with the supply of the finished petroleum product from petroleum refinery operation in Europe without Switzerland.

This activity covers the transport requirements for import of the finished petroleum product to Switzerland. Only transport of the product to Switzerland is considered here, whereas losses and infrastructure requirements during the import activities are omitted.
category: C:Manufacturing/19:Manufacture of coke and refined petroleum products/192:Manufacture of refined petroleum products/1920:Manufacture of refined petroleum products

processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Transport distances were sourced from Jungbluth & Meili (2018) Life cycle inventories of oil products distribution, table 8.1, which where based on estimated distances and modes of transport from the main countries of origin in 2016. The annual gross import (i.e., production volume of the activity) to Switzerland was taken from Swiss energy statistics for 2022 (BFE 2023. Schweizerische Gesamtenergiestatistik 2022, table 21. Available from: https://www.bfe.admin.ch/bfe/de/home/versorgung/statistik-und-geodaten/energiestatistiken/gesamtenergiestatistik.html/)

flow.name: petrol, low-sulfur
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals

exchanges.description: Amount based on transport requirements for import of mineral oil products from Europe to Switzerland for the year 2016, in Jungbluth & Meili (2018), table 8.1. Reference: Jungbluth, N. & Meili, C. (2018) Life cycle inventories of oil products - final report. ESU-services Ltd. Available from: https://esu-services.ch/data/public-lci-reports/
